synopsis:
The world is shaken by news of a man taking down a monstrous elephant with his bare hands. Back in Japan, Baki is confronted by a knife-wielding child

(Source: Netflix).

To train for his eventual battle against his father, Baki spars against an imaginary giant praying mantis he's created in his mind.

(Source: Netflix)

In the middle of a heavily guarded parade, the President of the United States is kidnapped in plain sight by an unknown young man.

(Source: Netflix)

Baki comes across a man known as "Mr. Second", a powerful inmate who seems to enjoy special privileges within the prison.

(Source: Netflix)

With just a few weeks left on his sentence, Iron Michael is attacked by a triplet hit men hired to make sure the ex-boxing champ never fights again.

(Source: Netflix)

Just as the Mouth triplets are about to finish their attack on Iron Michael, Guevaru rolls in and instigates a fight.

(Source: Netflix)

Guevaru refuses to believe that Biscuit Oliva, the most notorious inmate in the prison, is comfortably serving his sentence in the company of his lover.

(Source: Netflix)

The match between Guevaru and Oliva begins, and the rules are simple: They both hold onto the same piece of cloth and the first one to let go loses.

(Source: Netflix)

Guevaru is fighting for the people of his impoverished homeland, and he won't go down easily. Later, Oliva makes a discovery.

(Source: Netflix)

Baki is surrounded by guards with their guns pointed right at him, but he doesn't seem worried at all — he seems to be planning something.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: The Prison Guard talks about it

synopsis:
=en
Oliva inadvertently kicks off a major incident when he enters Baki's solitary confinment cell to challenge him to a fight in two week's time.

(Source: Netflix)

Baki learns the hard way that might not be ready to fight the man known as "Mr. Unchained" — Oliva's power and technique are on another level.

(Source: Netflix)
